item.title: 10 Crossfit Workouts to Build Muscle and Burn Fat
item.description: If you're looking to get in shape and build muscle while burning fat, Crossfit is the perfect workout for you. The combination of strength training and high-intensity interval training (HIIT) helps you build muscle and burn fat at the same time. Here are 10 Crossfit workouts that you can try to help you achieve your fitness goals. 1. Cindy Cindy is a classic Crossfit workout that consists of three exercises: pull-ups, push-ups, and air squats.
